value: L 27 140 St Georges Terrace, Perth, 6000, WA, Australia

7011 - Hotels and Motels Summary > FREMANTLE ESPLANADE HOTEL LTD is an Australian public company. Its operations cover hotels and motels. The company is not involved in the import or export of goods. FREMANTLE ESPLANADE HOTEL LTD is headquartered in Perth, Western Australia. It is headed by director John Bryan Bond. For the 2025 financial year, the company reported revenue of $7.18 million. Its net profit totalled $706,000. FREMANTLE ESPLANADE HOTEL LTD forms part of the services industry sector.
